scripts.gecode: curl -H "Authorization: token $GITHUB_TOKEN" -s https://api.github.com/repos/gecode/gecode/releases/latest | python -c 'import json, sys; release = json.loads(sys.stdin.read()); print(release["tag_name"].replace("release-", ""))'
scripts.telegram-desktop-bin: curl -H "Authorization: token $GITHUB_TOKEN" -s https://api.github.com/repos/telegramdesktop/tdesktop/releases | python -c 'import json, sys; releases = json.loads(sys.stdin.read()); releases = [r for r in releases if not r["prerelease"]]; print(releases[0]["tag_name"][1:])'
scripts.telegram-desktop-bin-dev: curl -H "Authorization: token $GITHUB_TOKEN" -s https://api.github.com/repos/telegramdesktop/tdesktop/releases/latest | python -c 'import json, sys; release = json.loads(sys.stdin.read()); print(release["tag_name"][1:])'
scripts.obs-service-tar_scm-git: curl -H "Authorization: token $GITHUB_TOKEN" -s https://api.github.com/repos/openSUSE/obs-service-tar_scm/tags | python -c 'import json, sys; tags = json.loads(sys.stdin.read()); print(tags[0]["name"][1:])'
scripts.telegram-qt-git: curl -H "Authorization: token $GITHUB_TOKEN" -s https://api.github.com/repos/Kaffeine/telegram-qt/tags | python -c 'import json, sys; tags = json.loads(sys.stdin.read()); print(tags[0]["name"][1:])'
scripts.telepathy-morse-git: curl -H "Authorization: token $GITHUB_TOKEN" -s https://api.github.com/repos/TelepathyIM/telepathy-morse/tags | python -c 'import json, sys; tags = json.loads(sys.stdin.read()); print(tags[0]["name"].replace("telepathy-morse-", ""))'
